website_summaries.verdict: You'll love the look and quality of this traditional and official cricket ball.
pros: Manufacturer uses 4-piece leather construction in the ball to ensure a high quality
Suitable for both recreational and club levels of play
Offered in both red and white colors
cons: Costs a little bit more than some other cricket balls

customer_reviews.title: Was not new as advertised
customer_reviews.text: When I received this in the mail, it looked like it had been used a few times, then cleaned off and put back in the packaging. I can say with certainty that this ball was not new. There were scuffs on the surface, and some of the lettering had rubbed off. I would have returned it, but I stupidly threw away the packaging, and the package slip, before I got a good look at the ball - a mistake I will never make again. Ultimately, I decided to keep it. It is not new, as was advertised, but it is in decent shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and misaligned
customer_reviews.text: The logo on the ball was almost completely rubbed off, the ball is damaged and the joint is misaligned. If I had to guess, this ball is not new. Would definitely not purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: abolt

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful cricket ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful cricket ball. I just bought it for show and it does a good job. I don't plan to play with this ball, but I'm sure it would perform admirably if I did.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: The ball's quality is terrible, the two halfs are not joint properly and ...
customer_reviews.text: The ball's quality is terrible, the two halfs are not joint properly and there looks to be some water damage too
customer_reviews.author: Silver Lu

customer_reviews.title: Ball was ripped and used
customer_reviews.text: I have oder ball actually in the description it says two balls but looking at ball it ripped and looks like used ball had been painted again I don't recommend anyone buying it.....
customer_reviews.author: IKRAMULLAH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a shame that our boys on their tour down under don't seem to be able to see it.

customer_reviews.text: Nice balls, good quality bought both red & white. Delivery was prompt.

customer_reviews.title: white leather cricket balls
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 10 of these ball for the matches over the weekend, Balls looks very good.
customer_reviews.author: Raza Momin

customer_reviews.title: I really like using this ball but I can tell it wont ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like using this ball but I can tell it wont even last for an entire ODI. If one was to play an ODI it the ball would last for 25-30 overs before it gets banged up and cracks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... used the new ball for a match and bowlers like it.
customer_reviews.text: We used the new ball for a match and bowlers like it .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holding Up Well!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cricket ball has been fantastic Here's my list to simplify everything down Me and my mates go play cricket at our local park here in NY We don't have time for a full t20 match so we play t10 or 10 overs each. The ball for the 20 overs has held up incredibly well and it's easy to bowl. The stitching is good and hasn't torn. The polish after a few overs starts coming off but that's normal. In general I have to say it has held up incredibly well. There isn't much more to say So thanks for reading and if this review helped you out, please hit the helpful button!! Have a wonderful day !!
customer_reviews.author: Rookie Malhotra

customer_reviews.title: Nice White T20 cricket ball have bought two of them ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice White T20 cricket ball have bought two of them on red and one white. Have used red one for practicing and training my son and will use the white one for practice match over the weekend. Good quality balls.
customer_reviews.author: Hum w

product_meta.title: CE Cricket Balls White Red for T20 Cricket Matches, Tournaments and Practice
feature_bullets: RED T20 DAISY CUTTER leather cricket ball, hand stitched ball by Cricket Equipment USA
The ball is suitable for club level play
Medium Grade cricket ball for shorter version of cricket games
Cortex center & 4 piece leather cricket ball in official weight
The ball is of official weight (5.5 to 5.7) ounces. Also available in White Colors
